select acc.a a,aname,atel,aaddr, agrade, aimg1 from accomodation acc, (select a,floor(avg(vgrade)) agrade from review group by a order by agrade desc) re where acc.a = re.a
and asubway like '%'|| #{asubway} ||'%'
and agu like '%'|| #{agu} ||'%'

select count(a) from accomodation where atype= #{atype}
and asubway like '%'|| #{asubway} ||'%'
and agu like '%'|| #{agu} ||'%'
AND ROWNUM > #{acurpage}*#{aonepage} AND ROWNUM <= #{acurpage}+1*#{aonepage}
and atheme like '%'|| #{item} ||'%'
order by writedate desc
order by aminprice asc
order by agrade desc
